import{createAsyncThunk}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{setLoading,setError,viewBookings,viewFeedbacks,setEvents,setTickets}from'./eventOwnerSlice';// Fetch Bookings
export const fetchBookings=createAsyncThunk('eventOwner/fetchBookings',async(eventId,_ref)=>{let{dispatch}=_ref;dispatch(setLoading(true));try{const response=await fetch(`/api/bookings/${eventId}`);const data=await response.json();dispatch(viewBookings(data));}catch(error){dispatch(setError(error.message));}finally{dispatch(setLoading(false));}});// Fetch Feedbacks
export const fetchFeedbacks=createAsyncThunk('eventOwner/fetchFeedbacks',async(eventId,_ref2)=>{let{dispatch}=_ref2;dispatch(setLoading(true));try{const response=await fetch(`/api/feedbacks/${eventId}`);const data=await response.json();dispatch(viewFeedbacks(data));}catch(error){dispatch(setError(error.message));}finally{dispatch(setLoading(false));}});// Create Event
export const createEvent=createAsyncThunk('eventOwner/createEvent',async(eventDetails,_ref3)=>{let{dispatch}=_ref3;dispatch(setLoading(true));try{const response=await fetch('/api/events',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(eventDetails)});const data=await response.json();// Optionally, you can update the events state here
dispatch(setEvents(data));}catch(error){dispatch(setError(error.message));}finally{dispatch(setLoading(false));}});// Update Event
export const updateEvent=createAsyncThunk('eventOwner/updateEvent',async(_ref4,_ref5)=>{let{eventId,eventDetails}=_ref4;let{dispatch}=_ref5;dispatch(setLoading(true));try{const response=await fetch(`/api/events/${eventId}`,{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(eventDetails)});const data=await response.json();// Handle updated events state if needed
dispatch(setEvents(data));}catch(error){dispatch(setError(error.message));}finally{dispatch(setLoading(false));}});// Delete Event
export const deleteEvent=createAsyncThunk('eventOwner/deleteEvent',async(eventId,_ref6)=>{let{dispatch}=_ref6;dispatch(setLoading(true));try{await fetch(`/api/events/${eventId}`,{method:'DELETE'});// Optionally, update the events state here
dispatch(fetchBookings());// Refresh bookings or events
}catch(error){dispatch(setError(error.message));}finally{dispatch(setLoading(false));}});// Update Profile
export const updateProfile=createAsyncThunk('eventOwner/updateProfile',async(profileDetails,_ref7)=>{let{dispatch}=_ref7;dispatch(setLoading(true));try{const response=await fetch('/api/profile',{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(profileDetails)});const data=await response.json();// Handle updated profile state if needed
}catch(error){dispatch(setError(error.message));}finally{dispatch(setLoading(false));}});// Create Ticket
export const createTicket=createAsyncThunk('eventOwner/createTicket',async(ticketDetails,_ref8)=>{let{dispatch}=_ref8;dispatch(setLoading(true));try{const response=await fetch('/api/tickets',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(ticketDetails)});const data=await response.json();// Handle tickets state if needed
dispatch(setTickets(data));}catch(error){dispatch(setError(error.message));}finally{dispatch(setLoading(false));}});// Update Ticket
export const updateTicket=createAsyncThunk('eventOwner/updateTicket',async(_ref9,_ref10)=>{let{ticketId,ticketDetails}=_ref9;let{dispatch}=_ref10;dispatch(setLoading(true));try{const response=await fetch(`/api/tickets/${ticketId}`,{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(ticketDetails)});const data=await response.json();// Handle updated tickets state if needed
dispatch(setTickets(data));}catch(error){dispatch(setError(error.message));}finally{dispatch(setLoading(false));}});// Delete Ticket

}catch(error){dispatch(setError(error.message));}finally{dispatch(setLoading(false));}});
